thread.title: ​This Rich Chocolate Cherry Smoothie Helps You Lose Weight
thread.title_full: ​This Rich Chocolate Cherry Smoothie Helps You Lose Weight

author: Barry K
title: ​This Rich Chocolate Cherry Smoothie Helps You Lose Weight
text:
​This Rich Chocolate Cherry Smoothie Helps You Lose Weight Try it for a heaping dose of protein and fiber that tastes like dessert Your Privacy Rights Canadian Customers 
Chocolate-covered cherries was one of my favorite treats as a kid, but as an adult trying to stay lean, I don't eat many anymore. This recipe from my Men's Health book The MetaShred Diet is my protein-and-fiber-packed alternative, which feeds my cravings and keeps me full for longer. It packs a serious load of antioxidants from the cherries and cocoa while also giving you a blend of both fast- and slow-digesting proteins. This is guaranteed to become one of your favorite shakes. 
What you'll need:
